trans-unit.source: Exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref> to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 노출 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> 에 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref> 를 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>에 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn"> </xref> 이와 연결 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> 연관 된 열

trans-unit.source: The automation peer for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 자동화 피어는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter"> </xref> 연관 된는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 이 연관 된 헤더에 대 한 컨트롤 형식을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 으로 표현 되는 헤더를 구분 하는 이름을 가져옵니다 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: The type name of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*> property that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 형식 이름을 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>이 연결 된 속성에 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결 되는 요소의 지정 된 컨트롤 패턴을 지 원하는 개체를 반환 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 다음과 같은 경우 중 하나가 발생할 경우 현재 반환 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>개체:- `patternInterface` 은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>과 관련 된 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>정렬할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` 은 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>과 관련 된 개체 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>사용자가 크기 조정할 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: - `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 패턴을 지정 하는 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current object, if patternInterface is a supported value; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 현재 개체가 있으면 patternInterface 지원 되는 값이 고, 그렇지 않으면, 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Remarks.
trans-unit.target: 자세한 내용은 설명 부분을 참조 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 이 자동화 피어와 연결 된 요소의 사용자에 게 표시 되는 데이터를 포함 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>모든 경우

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 활성화 하 고 해당 명확한 단일 작업을 시작 하는 요청을 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현 이며

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있습니다 경우에만 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>인스턴스로 캐스팅 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider>인터페이스.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the header and column that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"></xref> into view.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 하는 헤더 및 연관 된 열은 <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer"> </xref> 보기로 합니다.

trans-unit.target: 열을 이동할 수 있는지 여부를 지정 하는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.target: 가상 열에 UI 자동화 요소와 완벽 하 게 액세스할 수 있게 합니다.
